title: Prof Norman Fenton: Latest Data on Vaccine Efficacy & Safety From the UK
cleaned_text:
Prof Norman Fenton (UK): The latest data on vaccine efficacy & safety from the UK

Norman Fenton is a mathematician by training and Professor of Risk Information Management at Queen Mary London University. He is also a Director at Agena, a company specializing in risk management for critical systems. Norman’s current research focuses on critical decision-making and quantifying uncertainty.

This is an edited segment from the weekly live General Assembly meeting on December 13, 2021. The full meeting can be viewed here.
